name: Gamified Portfolio
description:
In this gamified portfolio, you will be able to discover many games I made within the scope of a Game Jam, my studies, or just for experience, personnal projects.

In the future, more games will be added, as well as menus and more achievements!

Find more directly on my itch.io profile
